decks.notes: This aggro deck focuses on efficiently using a mix of creatures, spells, and land destruction to quickly overwhelm opponents. The deck includes strong aggressive creatures like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Territorial Kavu, supported by burn spells like Lightning Bolt. Leyline cards enhance the deck's power by providing additional benefits and protection. Consign to Memory and Stubborn Denial offer answers to threats, while Arena of Glory boosts creature power. The deck aims to maintain pressure and disrupt opponents' strategies with a mix of creature aggression and spell disruption.

The deck focuses on deploying aggressive creatures like Phelia and Phlage, supported by disruptive spells like Galvanic Discharge and Prismatic Ending. It aims to control the opponent's resources with cards like Consign to Memory and Solitude while maintaining pressure on the opponent's life total. The deck's mana base includes fetch lands to ensure consistent color access and flexibility. Key cards like Ragavan and Quantum Riddler provide additional card advantage and synergies with the overall game plan. Overall, the deck combines aggro tactics with disruptive elements to disrupt the opponent's game plan and secure victory.

This deck focuses on utilizing a combination of aggressive creatures and disruptive spells to put pressure on the opponent while disrupting their game plan. By utilizing cards like Teferi, Time Raveler and Prismatic Ending to control the board, and creatures like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Quantum Riddler to apply pressure, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent quickly. With a mix of removal, card advantage, and threats, it aims to disrupt the opponent's strategies while pushing towards victory.

The deck focuses on utilizing artifacts to generate advantage and disruption, while also maintaining a fast-paced aggressive strategy. By combining powerful artifact creatures like Pinnacle Emissary and Kappa Cannoneer with synergy cards like Urza's Saga and Emry, Lurker of the Loch, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent quickly. Additionally, the inclusion of disruptive cards like Sink into Stupor and Metallic Rebuke adds another layer of control to the deck's strategy, ensuring that the opponent is constantly under pressure.

This aggro deck focuses on utilizing a mix of aggressive creatures and powerful spells to quickly overwhelm opponents. By combining efficient threats like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Territorial Kavu with disruptive cards like Stubborn Denial and Consign to Memory, the deck aims to apply pressure early and maintain control throughout the game. Leyline Binding and Leyline of the Guildpact provide additional support by locking down opposing threats and protecting the player's own creatures. The inclusion of powerful planeswalkers like Teferi, Time Raveler adds another layer of versatility and potential advantage to the deck's strategy.

This aggressive Death and Taxes deck aims to disrupt opponents with cards like Teferi, Time Raveler and Prismatic Ending while quickly overwhelming them with powerful creatures like Phage, Titan of Fire's Fury and Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer. By combining removal spells with fast clock threats, this deck looks to control the game tempo and punish opponents for their board state. With a mix of disruption, aggression, and card advantage, this deck seeks to outmaneuver opponents and secure victories through a combination of early pressure and card advantage.

This deck focuses on utilizing aggressive creatures and disruptive spells to disrupt opponents while maintaining board presence. By combining powerful creatures like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Phage, Titan of Fire's Fury with cards like Teferi, Time Raveler and Galvanic Discharge, the deck aims to control the tempo of the game and pressure the opponent. With a mixture of card advantage, removal, and efficient threats, this deck seeks to keep opponents on the back foot and force them to react to its threats, ultimately leading to victory through overwhelming aggression and disruption.

The main concept of this deck is to be aggressive by using low-cost creatures and spells to quickly deal damage to the opponent. Cards like Slickshot Show-Off, Monastery Swiftspear, and Cori-Steel Cutter are used to attack and apply pressure early in the game. The deck also includes burn spells like Lightning Bolt and Lava Dart to finish off the opponent. The inclusion of cards like Mutagenic Growth and Violent Urge help boost the power of your creatures and provide additional damage. The strategy is to overwhelm the opponent before they have a chance to set up their own game plan.

The main focus of this deck is to ramp up mana quickly with Utopia Sprawl and Eldrazi Temple to cast big Eldrazi creatures like Emrakul, the Promised End and Sire of Seven Deaths. Control elements like Kozilek's Command and Chalice of the Void help disrupt opponents' strategies, while cards like Malevolent Rumble and Kozilek's Return provide removal and board control. The deck aims to overwhelm opponents with powerful creatures and powerful spells, while also having some land disruption with Ghost Quarter and Bojuka Bog to disrupt opponent's game plan.

The deck focuses on utilizing artifacts and aggressive creatures to overwhelm the opponent with fast and efficient plays. Emry, Lurker of the Loch and Memnite provide quick threats, while cards like Mishra's Bauble and Mox Opal help to generate card advantage and mana acceleration. Urza's Saga and Engineered Explosives offer additional value and removal options, while Pinnacle Emissary and Kappa Cannoneer provide additional damage output. The inclusion of cards like Aether Spellbomb and Tormod's Crypt allow for disruption and versatility in dealing with various strategies, making it a versatile and powerful aggro deck.

The key concept of this deck is to quickly establish board presence and apply pressure on the opponent with aggressive creatures and efficient removal spells. The deck aims to control the game by using Leyline of the Guildpact to boost the power of its creatures, while also utilizing cards like Lightning Bolt and Stubborn Denial to disrupt the opponent's strategy. The inclusion of powerful finishers like Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury and Scion of Draco ensures that the deck can close out games quickly. The mana base is designed to support a diverse range of spells and enable consistent play.

This Boros Aggro deck focuses on speed and aggression, utilizing powerful creatures like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Seasoned Pyromancer to attack quickly and efficiently. With cards like Galvanic Discharge and Goblin Bombardment for additional damage, the goal is to overwhelm the opponent before they have a chance to stabilize. Key cards like Ajani, Nacatl Pariah and Arena of Glory provide support and buffs for your creatures, while Blood Moon and Static Prison disrupt your opponent's strategy. Overall, this deck aims to win fast and decisively through relentless aggression.

This deck aims to assemble a powerful combo utilizing Broodscale Bloodchief, Basking Broodscale, and Malevolent Rumble to generate a strong board presence and control the game. The deck focuses on ramping up mana quickly using Eldrazi Temple and Urza's Saga, while also using removal spells like Unholy Heat and Kozilek's Command to disrupt the opponent's strategy. With the ability to generate tokens, pump creatures, and deal direct damage, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent and secure a win through its powerful synergies and versatile playstyle.

This Jeskai Aggro deck focuses on utilizing a mix of powerful creatures like Ragavan and Phelia, along with powerful spells like Consign to Memory and Prismatic Ending to quickly overwhelm opponents and secure victory. The deck also includes cards like Goblin Bombardment and Ajani, Nacatl Pariah to provide additional ways to deal damage and control the board. With a versatile combination of creatures, spells, and lands, this deck aims to apply constant pressure and maintain a strong board presence throughout the game.

The main concept of this Amulet Titan deck is to utilize land ramp and mana acceleration to quickly bring out powerful creatures like Primeval Titan and Cultivator Colossus. The deck also aims to take advantage of the Amulet of Vigor to untap lands and generate even more mana. By efficiently ramping up mana and searching for key lands with cards like Scapeshift and Tolaria West, the deck can overwhelm the opponent with large, threatening creatures and potentially win the game in a single turn. The deck's key strength lies in its ability to assemble powerful combos and quickly close out games.

This deck focuses on ramping quickly to get out Primeval Titan and use its abilities to search for specific lands and overwhelm the opponent with powerful land combos. By utilizing cards like Amulet of Vigor, Green Sun's Zenith, and Scapeshift, the goal is to create a quick and efficient mana base to bring out powerful lands like Urza's Saga and Gruul Turf. With the ability to create multiple land drops in a turn and search for key lands, this deck aims to outpace and outmaneuver opponents in the Modern format.
